parameters.content:
## Astra - Data Store Agent
Job Description: Capture and store all important company data to our Vector Stores for Astra Intelligence Agent retrieval

parameters.name: q
parameters.value: ='{{ $json.meetings_folder_id }}' in parents and (mimeType='application/vnd.google-apps.document' or mimeType='application/pdf') and trashed=false

parameters.name: q
parameters.value: ='{{ $json.strategy_folder_id }}' in parents and (mimeType='application/vnd.google-apps.document' or mimeType='application/pdf') and trashed=false

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO document_chunks_meetings (
  content, title, document_date, batch_id, team_id, metadata, embedding
) 
VALUES (
  $1, $2, $3::timestamp, $4::uuid, $5::uuid, $6::jsonb, $7::vector
) 
ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT document_chunks_pkey 
DO UPDATE SET 
  content = EXCLUDED.content, 
  title = EXCLUDED.title,
  document_date = EXCLUDED.document_date,
  batch_id = EXCLUDED.batch_id,
  team_id = EXCLUDED.team_id,
  metadata = EXCLUDED.metadata, 
  embedding = EXCLUDED.embedding, 
  updated_at = NOW() 
RETURNING id

INSERT INTO document_chunks_strategy (
  content, title, document_date, batch_id, team_id, metadata, embedding
) 
VALUES (
  $1, $2, $3::timestamp, $4::uuid, $5::uuid, $6::jsonb, $7::vector
) 
ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT document_chunks_strategy_title_content_hash_key 
DO UPDATE SET 
  content = EXCLUDED.content, 
  title = EXCLUDED.title,
  document_date = EXCLUDED.document_date,
  batch_id = EXCLUDED.batch_id,
  team_id = EXCLUDED.team_id,
  metadata = EXCLUDED.metadata, 
  embedding = EXCLUDED.embedding, 
  updated_at = NOW() 
RETURNING id
